EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Tambah Bahagian 05 \(Sijil & Pencapaian\) dan Bahagian 06 \(Etika & Privasi Digital\)

- Bahagian 06: Privasi data murid, hak cipta, keselamatan web, etika AI
- Portfolio kini lengkap 15 muka surat \(6 bahagian\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
